Description: Funerary papyrus of Fedumont containing Book of Traversing Eternity (short version); black outline vignettes and Hieratic text in two columns recto; Hieratic title verso.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Egypt, Thebes (mentioned in the owner's titulary). (see Herbin 2008, 151)
Curator's comments: Bibliography: F.R. Herbin, Le Livre de parcourir l'eternite, OLA 58 (1994), pp.22-23, pl.XXVI. Herbin, F.-R., Books of Breathing and Related Texts (Catalogue of the Books of the Dead and Other Related Texts in the British Museum IV), London, 2008, pp. 151-153, pls. 141-142.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (62)
Herbin 2008 / Books of Breathing and Related Texts (pp.151-153, pls.141-142)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57911) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57911)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Displayed in Room 62 until 1997 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: self adhesive linen tape. Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A Curatorial condition comment: good
Associated titles: Associated Title: Book of Traversing Eternity
